Issue.creator: sambhavdutt
Issue.summary: Update the fabric-test pull script in release-1.3 and release-1.2 branches to pull binaries from Nexus.
Issue.description: Now that all binaries from the nightly job are published to Nexus Snapshots, Point the pull scripts to the Nexus `snapshots` for release-1.3 and release-1.2 branches.
